articles.author: Bob Yirka
articles.title: Mysterious fast radio burst turns out to be from long-dead NASA satellite - Phys.org
articles.description: A team of astronomers and astrophysicists affiliated with several institutions in Australia has found that a mysterious fast radio burst (FRB) detected last year originated not from a distant source, but from one circling the planet—a long-dead satellite. The…
